price: Kandi rwose bagezweho n’inkuru zibabuza (gukora ibibi),
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزۡدَجَرٌ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jāahum mina al-anbāi mā fīhi muz'dajarun
